00009     const std::string NAME("cpuset");
00010 }
00011 
00012 #define UTIL_NAME cpuset_name::NAME
00013 #define UTIL_CPRINT(fmt, ...)  CPRINT_WITH_NAME(UTIL_NAME, fmt, ##__VA_ARGS__)
00014 #define UTIL_VPRINT(fmt, ...)  VPRINT_WITH_NAME(UTIL_NAME, fmt, ##__VA_ARGS__)
00015 #define UTIL_WARNING(fmt, ...) WARNING_WITH_NAME(UTIL_NAME, fmt, ##__VA_ARGS__)
00016 #define UTIL_ERROR(fmt, ...) ERROR_WITH_NAME(UTIL_NAME, fmt, ##__VA_ARGS__)
00017 #define UTIL_RUNTIME(fmt, ...) RUNTIME_WITH_NAME(UTIL_NAME, fmt, ##__VA_ARGS__)
00018 #define UTIL_REPORT(fmt, ...) REPORT_WITH_NAME(UTIL_NAME, fmt, ##__VA_ARGS__);
00019 #define UTIL_DP(level, fmt, ...) DP(level, UTIL_NAME, fmt, ##__VA_ARGS__)

00021 namespace utility
00022 {
00045 unsigned int
00046 how_many_cpus(void)
00047 {
00048     long count = sysconf(_SC_NPROCESSORS_ONLN);
00049     if (count == -1)
00050         UTIL_ERROR("getting CPU count via sysconf");
00051 
00052     return static_cast<unsigned>(count);
00053 }
00054 
00055 void
00056 run_on_cpu(unsigned cpu, pid_t pid)
00057 {
00058     static unsigned CPUs = utility::how_many_cpus();
00059     cpu_set_t CPU_mask;
00060     int retcode;
00061 
00062     if (cpu >= CPUs)
00063         UTIL_RUNTIME("Illegal CPU value %d\n", cpu);
00064 
00065     UTIL_CPRINT("Using CPU %d as CPU to run on\n", cpu);
00066 
00067     retcode = sched_getaffinity(pid, sizeof(CPU_mask), &CPU_mask);
00068     if (retcode)
00069         UTIL_ERROR("sched_getaffinity failed");
00070 
00071     if (!__CPU_ISSET(cpu, &CPU_mask))
00072         UTIL_RUNTIME("not allowed to use CPU %u", cpu);
00073 
00074     __CPU_ZERO(&CPU_mask);
00075     __CPU_SET(cpu, &CPU_mask);
00076 
00077     retcode = sched_setaffinity(pid, sizeof(CPU_mask), &CPU_mask);
00078     if (retcode)
00079         UTIL_ERROR("Failed to set processor affinity for CPU %u", cpu);
00080 
00081     UTIL_CPRINT("Okay: assigned to CPU %u\n", cpu);
00082 }
00083 
00084 }       // end utility namespace
